title: Critical Bug Fixes and Metadata Updates
Add MIT LICENSE file to repository
description: Add LICENSE file with MIT license text to match package.json license field

title: Remove main.js from git tracking
description: Remove the 50KB main.js from git history as it's a build artifact that should not be tracked (already in .gitignore)

title: Fix CSS syntax error in styles.css
description: Remove malformed }"]) characters from line 5 of styles.css that are causing CSS parsing errors

title: Update package.json metadata to match manifest.json
description: Update name, version, description, and author in package.json to match the actual plugin details from manifest.json

title: Add error handling to loadHiddenState method
description: Add try-catch blocks to loadHiddenState() method in main.ts to handle corrupted data gracefully

title: Remove console.log statements from production code
description: Remove console.log statements from main.ts lines 31 and 50, or replace with Obsidian's Notice API if user feedback is needed

title: Fix hidden line numbers issue in edit mode
description: Line numbers for hidden completed tasks still display in edit mode, causing visual gaps. Need to update CSS to hide line numbers for completed tasks. Related to GitHub issue #28

title: Modernize Dependencies and Tooling
description: Update project dependencies, GitHub Actions, add LICENSE file, and clean up git tracking to bring the project up to current standards

title: Update all npm dependencies to current versions
description: Update TypeScript 4.0.3 to 5.x, Rollup plugins from 2020 to latest, @types/node v14 to latest, and obsidian API from master tarball to specific version

title: Modernize GitHub Actions workflow
description: Update from deprecated actions/checkout@v2 to v4, actions/setup-node@v1 to v4, replace deprecated actions/create-release and upload-release-asset, update Node.js 15.x to LTS, fix deprecated set-output command
